item.title: [转]提问的智慧
item.description: 提问的智慧 <div> <div class="author"> <h3 class="author"> 艾瑞克.史蒂文.雷蒙德（<span class="firstname">Eric</span> <span class="othername">Steven</span> <span class="surname">Raymond）</span> </h3> <div class="affiliation"> <span class="orgname"><a href="http://www.catb.org/~esr/" target="_top" target="_blank" rel="nofollow" >Thyrsus Enterprises</a><br /> </span></p> <div class="address"> <code class="email">&lt;&lt;a href="mailto:esr@thyrsus.com" target="_blank" rel="nofollow" >esr@thyrsus.com&lt;/a>&gt;</code></p> </div> </div> </div> </div> <div> <div class="author"> <h3 class="author"> 瑞克.莫恩（<span class="firstname">Rick</span> <span class=&quo
